===Noun===
{{ja-noun|しこん}}

# a [[philosophy]] in [[Shintoism]]; within one's own [[heart]] there exists four '[[souls]]', in either their [[positive]] ({{ja-r|直霊|なおび}} and/or [[negative]] ({{ja-r|禍津日|まがつひ}} [[aspects]], and that it is the [[interaction]]s between these four souls, in either aspect, and in [[vary]]ing [[amount]]s and [[level]]s, that can influence the [[ups and downs]] in that person's [[character]], [[good]] or [[bad]].
